import pandas as pd
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df = pd.read_csv('./data/raw.csv')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df.columns = list(range(df.shape[1]))
df.index = list(range(df.shape[0]))
df.columns.name = 'household'
df.index.name = 'time'
